description:
Luffy is in the line of fire after saving Zoro, and now tyrannical Captain Morgan is out for their heads! Zoro must decide if he will join forces with Luffy or die in captivity.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Morgan VS Luffy ! Qui est cette belle inconnue ?
Morgan VS Luffy! Nazo no Bishoujo wa Dare?
Morgan vs. Luffy! Quem é Aquela Linda Misteriosa?
Morgan vs. Luffy! Who`s the Mysterious Pretty Girl?
Морган против Луффи! Кто эта загадочная красотка?
มอร์แกนปะทะลูฟี่ เด็กคนนี้คือใครน่ะ!
モーガンVSルフィ! 謎の美少女は誰?
蒙卡VS路飞！神秘的美少女是谁？
모건 VS 루피! 수수께끼의 미소녀는 누구?
